ygData.subject: RE: Arrows in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Inn number 4 in East Commons is the easiest to find.  While facing the Inn, enter the shack on the left.  There is also one in Freeport, I just can t remember
ygData.messageBody:
Inn number 4 in East Commons is the easiest to find. While facing the Inn,
enter the shack on the left. There is also one in Freeport, I just can't
remember where she is :) It is in another building with a regular vendor
but she stands off to the side.



> ----------
> From: Sir Flann Greystone[SMTP:sirnjord@...]
> Reply To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 19, 1999 12:38 PM
> To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Fletchers] Arrows in Freeport
>
> From: "Sir Flann Greystone" <sirnjord@...>
>
> Hail fellow fletchers,
>
> I have spent most of my 11 seasons in the Qeynos/Surefall Glade/Karanas.
> I
> have recently moved to the Freeport area to hunt with friends. Can anyone
>
> tell me the best place to buy npc arrows near or in Freeport?
>
> My understanding is that to buy arrow making components I must travel to
> Kelethin, or back to my home in Surefall Glade. Am I wrong, are there any
>
> other sources of arrow components near Freeport?
>
> Thanks
>
> Flann
> Ranger on Cazik-Thule
